game.name: To The Skies!
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Hoverboard racing with flow at its core. Combines free-flight and track based racing. Big air, perfect landings, and endless retries.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Hoverboard racing with flow at its core. Combines free-flight and track based racing. Big air, perfect landings, and endless retries.
